md:
giải nghĩa từ "screened" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ trái nghĩa.

* Screened (verb)
	+ Meaning: to examine or investigate someone or something carefully in order to decide if they are suitable or acceptable
	+ Example: The company screened all the job applicants to find the best candidate.
	+ Related words: examine, investigate, inspect, scrutinize
	+ Antonyms: ignore, overlook, neglect

* Screened (adjective)
	+ Meaning: protected or hidden from view by a screen or something else
	+ Example: The screened porch provided a comfortable outdoor seating area.
	+ Related words: sheltered, protected, hidden, concealed
	+ Antonyms: exposed, open, visible

* Screened (past tense and past participle of screen)
	+ Meaning: to show a movie or video on a screen
	+ Example: The film was screened at the cinema last night.
	+ Related words: showed, displayed, projected, broadcast
	+ Antonyms: hidden, concealed, removed
html:

  • Screened (adjective)
